title: House of Flavor
description: A 100% vegan/vegetarian Rastafarian restaurant. Serves one set collection of curries with brown rice (in a calabash if desired) every day from around 7:00 am until 3:00 pm, depending on how long the food lasts; choose from small, medium or large sizes. Drinks and in-house-made ginger limeade are available. The restaurant shares space with a CD shop.
